name: LD41 Dig And Sweep
description:
Dig for golds in 120s! 
Avoid those mines.

PS: Type "infinite" in title scene to enable no time limit mode.

CONTROLS: 
LMB: Dig
RMB: Mark
LMB+RMB: Try it in a mine sweeper game!

DEVELOP TOOLS: 
Unity 2017.3.0f3 
Aseprite
Bfxr

Ludum Dare Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/$77278
